mapper.sql: PUID, P_MATERIEL_CODE, P_MATERIEL_TYPE, P_MATERIEL_WERK, P_MATERIEL_DESC, P_PERTAIN_TO_PROJECT_PUID
mapper.update: update HZ_SUPER_MATERIEL_RECORD set P_MATERIEL_CODE = #{pMaterielCode,jdbcType=OTHER}, P_MATERIEL_TYPE = #{pMaterielType,jdbcType=OTHER}, P_MATERIEL_WERK = #{pMaterielWerk,jdbcType=OTHER}, P_MATERIEL_DESC = #{pMaterielDesc,jdbcType=OTHER}, P_PERTAIN_TO_PROJECT_PUID = #{pPertainToProjectPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
